title: I am about tired of Yi now
body:
Every game he sneaks past the bans, he wrecks.

Point and click champion that can dodge any enemy ability. Yeah, that's not like, super annoying or anything. 

The guy takes no skill to play compared to the skill necessary to shut him down as he runs through a battle, not being able to slow him, and then vanishing, making your ability miss, while your team now wonders where exactly he is going to reappear, and then when he does, with his glass cannon build he life steal so much you can't kill him.

I fucking promise you if Riot brought in an independent analysis team to examine the strength of champions, the would be floored at how thoughtless and sloppy the champions are balanced.

replies.body:
I'm just waiting for the cc posts. 

But wait, what if Your team doesn't have hard cc! Then it's your fault for letting him get to late game, you deserve to lose even though it was your team that fed him 17 kills and not you.

Yes, that's right.

If your team has no hard CC, you have an absolutely horrible team composition and deserve the loss.

It's the collective fault of the entire team.

The same for comps with no AP, tanks, or initiation.
Then I might as well start doing blind pick and start spamming Yi.

Yeah, but even in blind pick people are generally smart enough to pick at least a couple disables.

There are so many tops, supports, mids, and junglers with some form of CC that it's somewhat hard NOT to have it.

Welcome to League of Legends. 
Where the salt is salty, where water is filled with bleach, and where a Master Yi with a brain can solo carry matches.

Then ban him lol, what are bans for?

Also the only problem about Yi IMO gameplay-wise, and it's a personal thing, is that he is too hard to click on after he Q's, let him dodge stuff but it's so fucking disorienting that it feels like he's untargetable for .5-1 more seconds than he actually is.

Combined with the fact that he kills you in about 1 second late game... you see how that's a problem. The reduced cooldown on Q from a kill is really unnecessary imo, reducing it by autoing is plenty.
I used to feel the same untill I started playing a lot of support. Now I just lock in Leona and wait for the sweet Yi tears
